name: Ducky Sokoban
description:
A cutesy take on a classic I grew up with, including 90 classic Sokoban levels.

Most Sokoban clones I've played are audio-free; this one _does_ have sound effects, but the atmosphere is quiet and peaceful--it's a good game to play before bed.

How to Play
  • The object of each level is to push each piece of bread into its own basket.
  • When every basket is filled with bread, you win!
  • You cannot pull the bread or pass over it.
Controls

( Keyboard / XBox controller )

System Requirements
  • Windows 64bit
  • 512MB RAM (usage ~15MB)
  • Honestly unsure about CPU speed--the game _is_ software-rendered...
